name: Hidden Object: Haunted Castle
description:
Secret Mystery Haunted Castle: Hidden Object Game300 Levels is a mind-boggling and exhilarating mysterious hidden object and spot the difference game. Join this challenging and addictive hidden object and spot the difference game and become a keen-eyed detective with our beautiful and innocent Ava. This hidden object game does not have any hidden costs and assures you a fascinating experience without the need of internet connection.

Haunted Castle: Hidden Object Game 300 Levels is a real adventurous seek and find the hidden object and find the difference game for free for every single individual out there. This truly free hidden object detective game mystery has an ancient story connected to Ava, who is searching for the hidden objects in her old haunted midnight castle.

 

Hidden Object : Haunted Castle is free and offline best hidden object game ever! Download this exciting game.
